original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2541)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2541)@</color>召喚聖獸青龍分身降靈，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2541)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2541)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對目標區內的敵人造成傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2541)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2541)@</color> Summon the sacred beast Qinglong clone to descend spirits, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2541)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2541)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes damage to enemies in the target area.
